definition: key (on a piano or computer keyboard)/button (on a mouse or other device)/chemical bond/linchpin

sentences.english: This rule applies to keypad switch lines, too, despite their insulating keycaps.
sentences.chinese: 儘管鍵帽是絕緣的，這個準則也應用到鍵區開關線。

sentences.english: The new utility model referrs to a kind of cleaning guard board for computer keyboard and keyboard cover.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型是一種用於計算機鍵盤鍵帽的保潔護板。
